content: **overview** this charming felted bag is a quick knit perfect for gifting or using up leftover feltable yarn it s a versatile project that can be easily customized in both size and style use it to store knitting needles and notions school supplies makeup or small essentials inside your larger bag *to adjust the size simply add more row for extra height or cast on additional stitches for a wider bag * you can finish your bag in a variety of ways add an i-cord string or leather strap to turn it into a small purse or crossbody bag skip the zipper by casting oﬀ half of the stitches and continuing with the remaining half to create a flap closure the flap should measure about half the total length of the finished bag after felting the result is 22 x 13 cm sturdy soft and durable bag with endless customization possibilities e g embroidery **materials** 5 5 mm circular knitting needles 20-25 cm zipper
